headline: Exxon Mobil (XOM): Evaluating Valuation After Its Steady Post-Pioneer Climb
summary: Why Exxon Mobil Is Back on Investors Radar Exxon Mobil (XOM) has quietly ground higher this year, and that steady climb is catching income and value investors attention as they weigh its cash generation against a still cautious energy backdrop. See our latest analysis for Exxon Mobil. At a share price of $115.38, Exxon Mobil has notched a solid year to date as investors warm to its steady cash flows, while a 5 year total shareholder return above 200 percent underlines that momentum, though...
